title: Third government of Pedro Sánchez - Wikipedia
snippet: It succeeded the second Sánchez government and has been the incumbent government of Spain since 21 November 2023, a total of 750 days, or 2 years and 19 days.

title: Pedro Sánchez (Prime Minister of Spain) - On This Day
snippet: Pedro Sánchez is a Spanish politician and, since 2018, the Prime Minister of Spain. He has also held the office of Secretary-General for the Spanish...

title: Pedro Sánchez Secures New Term to Lead a Divided Spain - The New York Times
snippet: Pedro Sánchez, the Spanish progressive leader, secured a second term as prime minister on Thursday after a polarizing agreement granting amnesty to Catalan separatists gave him enough support in Parliament to govern with a fragile coalition over an increasingly divided nation.
